New Records: Rohit Sharma scored 131 off 84 balls, which is a significant performance in the match.
Key Match Events: Virat Kohli scored 55 not out off 56 balls.
Jasprit Bumrah took 4 wickets for 39 runs.
India won by 8 wickets with 90 balls remaining.
Pre-Game Insights: Afghanistan won the toss and elected to bat first.
Post-Match Reflections: Rohit Sharma was named Player of the Match for his outstanding performance.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was held at Arun Jaitley Stadium, Delhi.
Total attendance for the match was 32,000.
India secured 2 points from the match while Afghanistan got 0 points.
